item.title: Wife of Uganda’s opposition leader describes moment armed men attacked her at home - AP News
item.description: Wife of Uganda’s opposition leader describes moment armed men attacked her at home AP NewsUganda’s opposition leader is on the run The EconomistMuwanga Kivumbi: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence BBCWife of Ugandan opposition leader Bobi Wine in hospital after soldiers raid her house africanews.comUganda: Repression leaves Bobi Wine’s party without its leaders The Africa Report
